title: Am I able to get a refund on a purchase I bought accidentally?
body: Just today on October 21, I wanted to buy Ezreal so I can play him. But I accidentally purchased him with RP instead of IP. I was wondering if I would be able to contact Riot to refund my money, so  I can buy Star Guardian Ezreal.

replies.body: You can always hit up our billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if they could get him refunded for you or not, but I'm not 100% sure they can in this case since Ezreal was bought and immediately used. Always worth it to ask though!
